column4: i'm trying to install ubuntu from my flash drive but it won't go bast the purple screen with the dots
press esc at that screen to see messages
i did and it says error all the way down
press F6 at the menue and disable lapic
and test media and memory
lapic isn't there
oh nolapic
i still get the error with nolapic
and test media and memory
broken download, burnt to broken cdrom
memory on one netbook is 512mb on the other is 1gb
what am i looking for in memtest?
memtest list errors in red colour
it doesn't list anything
let it test at least 15 minutes
could it possibly be a bad flash drive?
well, it is possible, but more likely a broken download
i first tried downloading it and using startup disc creator, then that didn't work so i deleted the download and had unetbootin download and mount it for me, and same issue
well - maybe unetbootin failed? i didn't try it with lucid
unetbootin was the second method i tried, first was download and mount with SDC
still no errors
on the memtest i mean
i did yet a 3rd download and same thing. could it be the download mirror?
i keep having that same issue. i'm downloading from the canada mirror now
